titleStmt.title: The dead tearme. Or, VVestminsters complaint for long vacations and short termes Written in manner of a dialogue betweene the two cityes London and Westminster. The contentes of this discourse is in the page following. By T. Dekker.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by W. Jaggard] and are to be sold by Iohn Hodgets at his house in Pauls Churchyard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
